name: Magic
content: Woo yo woo yo woo yo
Yoo yo yo woo
You made the colour shine real bright
Every little step you take
Every little move you've made
Cause all that I have ever wanted
All that I have ever need
You love all what I believe it
It's magic that I feel yeah
You made the colour shine real bright
Every little step you take
Every little move you've made
It's everything that you say
Magic you create
Cause all that I have ever wanted
All that I have ever need
You were worried all what I believe it
It's magic that I feel yeah
All I have ever wanted it is you
All I have ever wanted it is you
Everything's gonna be alright
As long as you were from my side
Everything's gonna be alright
Every little step you take
Every little move you've made
Cause all that I have ever wanted
All that I have ever need
You were worried all what I believe it
It's the magic that I feel yeah
All I have ever wanted it is you
All I have ever wanted it is you
